sndlib.core.io
Interface SNDlibParser

All Known Implementing Classes:
SNDlibNativeParser, SNDlibXmlParser
public interface SNDlibParser

This interface provides the common methods to parse Networks, Models and Solutions.

An implementation of this interface for handling a specific IO-format can be obtained by calling the static factory method SNDlibIOFactory.newParser(String).

The IO-formats currently implemented are listed in SNDlibIOFormat.

Author:
Roman Klaehne
See Also:
SNDlibIOFactory, SNDlibIOFormat
